title: Did Congress in 2006 "drive" $50 billion to build border plumbing?
subtitle: When some prominent Democrats voted for the "safe fence" law, did they agree to ten times more funding than President Donald Trump asked for his border wall in 2018?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: With the adoption of the Security Act in 2006, members of the United States Congress voted to allocate or allocate $50 billion to finance the border fence.
